title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
ccess since the official release of BG3. This page includes all possible journal update listed in the objectives below.

The Blade of Frontiers Objectives

Hunt down Karlach.

We recruited Wyll, a monster hunter known as the Blade of Frontiers. He is on a mission to kill Karlach, a powerful devil who is a danger to the entire Sword Coast.
